Class StringManipulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • StringManipulator
  • class StringManipulator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a set of methods useful in games like hangman and dumb-charades - games that involve string manipulation. This code is free to use, modify and re-distribute.
    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Jonathan Gerard (jona2jef@gmail.com)

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) java.lang.String combine​(java.lang.String str, java.lang.String other)
      Combine two strings of the same length.
      (package private) java.lang.String generateDash​(java.lang.String str)
      Generate a string of dashes whose length is equivalent to a given string.
      (package private) java.lang.String removeSpaces​(java.lang.String str)
      Remove all spaces and special characters in a string
      (package private) java.lang.String reveal​(java.lang.String str, char ch)
      Reveal a character in a string of dashes using the help of the original string.

      • reveal

        java.lang.String reveal​(java.lang.String str,
                        char ch)
        Reveal a character in a string of dashes using the help of the original string.
        Parameters:
        str - the String currently being handled.
        ch - The character that must be revealed.

      • combine

        java.lang.String combine​(java.lang.String str,
                         java.lang.String other)
        Combine two strings of the same length. Parameters can be interchanged, but must definitely be of SAME LENGTH.
        Parameters:
        str - Original string (or first string)
        other - Other string (or second string)
